title: Efficient Export Customs Clearance
description: In 2023, North Macedonia achieved an average customs clearance time of just 1.1 days for exports, showcasing its efficiency in facilitating international trade.

title: High Prevalence of Non-Communicable Diseases
description: In 2019, 96.13% of deaths in North Macedonia were attributed to non-communicable diseases, indicating a significant public health challenge.

title: Complete Urban Birth Registration
description: North Macedonia achieved a 100% birth registration rate in urban areas in 2019, ensuring all urban births are officially recorded.

title: Decline in Service Sector Growth
description: In 2023, the service sector in North Macedonia experienced a drastic decline with a growth rate of -100%, highlighting economic challenges in this sector.

title: Balanced Income Distribution in Fourth Quintile
description: In 2019, the fourth 20% income group in North Macedonia held 24.8% of the national income, reflecting a relatively balanced income distribution.

title: Low Mortality from Communicable Diseases
description: In 2019, only 1.28% of deaths in North Macedonia were due to communicable diseases, indicating effective disease control measures.
